trans-unit.source: Blocking call to evaluate (test-run) an autoscale formula on the given pool.
trans-unit.target: Blocking call to evaluate (test-run) an autoscale formula on the given pool.

trans-unit.source: It does not change any state of the pool and it does not affect the last modified time or ETag of the pool.
trans-unit.target: It does not change any state of the pool and it does not affect the last modified time or ETag of the pool.

trans-unit.source: The autoscale formula to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: The autoscale formula to be evaluated.

trans-unit.source: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.
trans-unit.target: A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

trans-unit.source: The results of the auto scale evaluation.
trans-unit.target: The results of the auto scale evaluation.

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.
